content: hat for a little girl i made this hat for my 3years old little sister so the pattern is for quite small hat if you want bigger hat just add few more increasing-row notes don´t join the row with slp st you can mark the end of the row with opposite colour yarn you need crochet hook 4mm g hook cotton yarn i used novita samos aran / 10 ply 8 wpi about chain 2 1st row 6sc to the 2nd chain from the hook 6sc 2nd row 2sc to every single_crochet 12sc 3rd row 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat around 18sc 4th row 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet repeat around 24 single_crochet 5th row 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet repeat around 30 single_crochet 6th row 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet repeat around 36 single_crochet 7th row 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet repeat around 42 single_crochet 8th row 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 6 single_crochet repeat around 48 single_crochet 9th row 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 7 single_crochet repeat around 54 single_crochet 10th row 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 8 single_crochet repeat around 60sc 11th row 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 9 single_crochet repeat around 66sc 12th row 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 10 single_crochet repeat around 72sc 13th row 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 11 single_crochet repeat around 78sc single_crochet to each single_crochet work for about 23 row about 9-10 cm 4 it would do good if you test the hat for the children so you see the right size break off yarn brim join yarn to the right side of the hat 1st row *single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet to the next single_crochet* repeat around the last increasing isn´t going to be perfect but it doesn´t matter just stop in the last stitch don´t mind about the increasing 2nd row shell round *single_crochet skip single_crochet 5 double_crochet to the next single_crochet skip single_crochet* repeat around join with slip_stitch 3rd row one double_crochet to the 3rd double_crochet of first shell *5dc to the single_crochet single_crochet to the 3rd double_crochet* repeat around work 2 more row sew the yarn ends to the hat you can add flowers to it if you want your hat is ready ©minttusuklaa you can sell products made from this pattern but don´t sell pattern itself
